effects.description: The Earth Turtle uses the earth's power to assist his owner.
A bunny...with a sword...it's dangerous, watch out!
Jyubi is a red-orange and orange ten-tailed bird and it uses Fire Release Ninjutsu, and blocking attacks received by the master.
The legendary nine-tailed demon fox who is good at using Fire Release & Gedo Cannon.
Nanabi is a ferret with seven tails.
Active at the volcano area, Tomaru can emit fireball from its mouth.

Tornado Jyubi is a green ten-tailed bird and it uses Wind Release Kinjutsu, and blocking attacks received to the master. It also has higher Dodge, Critical, Purify, Accuracy and Agility rates, compared to all the other pets.
Nanabi is a ferret with seven tails.
Yamaru is a bat that possesses the spirit of a vampire.
